DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_QTDE_OPORTUNIDADES_PERDIDAS_FILIAL_DIRETOR_GERAL
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) QTDEOPORTPERD
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES A
JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAS B ON A.PESSOA = B.HANDLE
WHERE B.CLIENTEDESDE IS NOT NULL
AND DATEDIFF(YEAR,B.CLIENTEDESDE,GETDATE()) >= 1 
AND A.STATUS = 9
AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTDEOPORTPERD" From="A" Path="QTDEOPORTPERD" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
